summary: Current TDS levels are significantly elevated, which may stress the Blue Nile tilapia and affect plant growth.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 6.8-7.2; consider adding pH buffers if fluctuations occur.
Dilute water with fresh water to lower TDS; aim for 800-1200 ppm for optimal tilapia health.
Increase water temperature to around 24-28Â°C for optimal growth of tilapia and plants.
